From Ability Tokens.Ways to Obtain: Ability tokens from specific red or blue bees or Windy Bee, tokens from red or blue flowers, and tokens from Balloons during a Surprise Party.
From Ability Tokens.Individual\nEffect: x1.2 Red, Blue, or White Pollen (depends on boost color)
From Ability Tokens.Effect at Max\nCap (Stack): x3 Red, White, or Blue Pollen

From Ability Tokens.Ways to Obtain: Collecting any bomb ability tokens, catching fuzz bombs, and tokens from Balloons during a Surprise Party.
Ability tokens from Hasty, Shocked, Ninja, and Photon Bees, and bees with the Toy Drum Beequip equipped.
Ability tokens from Looker, Commander, and Music Bees, and Puppy Bee with the Reindeer Antlers Beequip equipped.
Ability tokens from Music Bee, bees with the Toy Horn Beequip equipped, and tokens from Balloons during a Surprise Party.
Ability tokens from Rage Bee and Spicy Bee.
Ability tokens from Baby Bee and Gifted Tadpole Bee.
Ability tokens from Tabby Bee.
From Ability Tokens.Individual\nEffect: +1% Tabby Bee Convert Rate, +1% Tabby Bee Pollen Collection, and +1% Pollen from Scratch
From Ability Tokens.Effect at Max\nCap (Stack): +1000% Tabby Bee Convert Rate, +1000% Tabby Bee Pollen Collection, and +1000% Pollen from Scratch

From Ability Tokens.Ways to Obtain: Ability tokens from Tabby Bee.
From Ability Tokens.Duration\nof Effect: 20 seconds (+2 seconds for every Tabby bee's level)

From Ability Tokens.Ways to Obtain: Ability tokens from Gifted Tabby Bee.
From Ability Tokens.Individual\nEffect: +25% Critical Power, +1% Critical Chance, +1% Super Critical Chance
From Ability Tokens.Duration\nof Effect: 20 seconds (+2 seconds for every Tabby bee's level)

From Ability Tokens.Ways to Obtain: Ability token from Puppy Bee.
From Ability Tokens.Duration\nof Effect: 10 seconds (+1 second for every puppy bee's level)

From Ability Tokens.Ways to Obtain: By being in an area of a balloon.
Stand in range of a Pollen Mark.
From Ability Tokens.Duration\nof Effect: When the player steps away from Pollen Mark or it disappears

From Ability Tokens.Ways to Obtain: Stand in range of a Honey Mark.
From Ability Tokens.Individual\nEffect: x1.25 Convert Rate, 2 Conversion Links which convert pollen through random bees
From Ability Tokens.Duration\nof Effect: When the player steps away from Honey Mark or it disappears

From Ability Tokens.Ways to Obtain: Stand in range of a Festive Mark.
From Ability Tokens.Individual\nEffect: +10% Honey Per Pollen, x1.4 Bomb Pollen, x1.4 Red Bomb Pollen, 100% Instant Bomb Conversion, +5 Conversion Links
From Ability Tokens.Duration\nof Effect: When the player steps away from Festive Mark or it disappears

From Ability Tokens.Ways to Obtain: Ability tokens from Cobalt and Crimson Bees.
From Ability Tokens.Individual\nEffect:
+10% red/blue pollen (depends on color)
+10% instant red/ blue conversion (depends on color)
Allow red/blue bombs (depends on color) to collect from white flowers. If both are active, bombs can collect from any flower.

From Ability Tokens.Ways to Obtain: Ability tokens from Bear Bee and through codes.
From Ability Tokens.Individual\nEffect: x2 Pollen, +24 Movespeed, and +65 Jump Power

From Ability Tokens.Ways to Obtain: Ability tokens from Gifted Bear Bee and through codes.
From Ability Tokens.Individual\nEffect: x2 Pollen, +1 Conversion Link, +24 Movespeed, and +65 Jump Power

From Ability Tokens.Ways to Obtain: Ability tokens from Gifted Bear Bee and through codes.
From Ability Tokens.Individual\nEffect: x2.5 pollen, x1.5 Bee Gather Pollen, +24 Movespeed, and +65 Jump Power

From Ability Tokens.Ways to Obtain: Ability tokens from Gifted bees and through codes.
Festive Gift and Festive Sprout.
From Ability Tokens.Duration\nof Effect:
Festive Gift: +10 seconds
Festive Sprout: +30 seconds
Up to 5 minutes

From Ability Tokens.Ways to Obtain: Festive Gift (when Festive Bee is gifted) and Festive Sprout.
From Ability Tokens.Individual\nEffect: x2 Bee Movespeed and x1.5 Pollen
From Ability Tokens.Duration\nof Effect:
Festive Gift: +10 seconds
Festive Sprout: +30 seconds
Up to 5 minutes

From Ability Tokens.Ways to Obtain: Ability tokens from Gifted Spicy Bee.
From Ability Tokens.Individual\nEffect:
x1.5 Flame Duration;
When flames are created, they instantly convert 50,000 +5% of Convert Total

From Ability Tokens.Ways to Obtain: The Snowglobe Shake ability token from bees with the Snowglobe Beequip equipped.
From Ability Tokens.Individual\nEffect: +10% Convert Rate At Hive, +5% Pollen From Tools, +5% Bee Gather Pollen, +1% Honey Per Pollen, +1% Loot Luck, x1.25 Capacity (fixed to x1.25)
From Ability Tokens.Effect at Max\nCap (Stack): +50% Convert Rate At Hive, +25% Pollen From Tools, +25% Bee Gather Pollen, +5% Honey Per Pollen, +10% Loot Luck, x1.25 Capacity

From Ability Tokens.Ways to Obtain: Making combos with Reindeer Fetch from Puppy Bee with the Reindeer Antlers Beequip equipped.
From Ability Tokens.Duration\nof Effect: 15 minutes or until the player leaves the game

From Ability Tokens.Ways to Obtain: Hitting all 3 targets of Precise Bee's Target Practice Ability.
Hitting the purple (Farthest) target of Gifted Precise Bee's Target Practice.
From Ability Tokens.Duration\nof Effect: When the player steps away from Precise Mark or it disappears

From Ability Tokens.Ways to Obtain: Ability tokens from Digital Bee.
From Ability Tokens.Individual\nEffect: +1% Ability Duplication Chance, x1.01 Duped Ability Pollen, +1% Instant Duped Ability Conversion
From Ability Tokens.Effect at Max\nCap (Stack): +20% Ability Duplication Chance, x3 Duped Ability Pollen, +90% Instant Duped Ability Conversion
From Ability Tokens.Duration\nof Effect: When the player steps away from the field, or when the corruption ends

From Ability Tokens.Ways to Obtain: Collecting Focus tokens with the APM upgrade purchased during a Robo Bear Challenge round.
From Ability Tokens.Individual\nEffect: x1.03 Pollen from Tools, x1.03 Collector Tool Speed
From Ability Tokens.Effect at Max\nCap (Stack): x1.3 Pollen from Tools, x1.3 Collector Tool Speed

From Ability Tokens.Ways to Obtain: Collecting Mark tokens with the Demarcate upgrade purchased during a Robo Bear Challenge round.
Collecting Blue Boost tokens with the Blue Screen upgrade purchased during a Robo Bear Challenge round.
From Ability Tokens.Individual\nEffect: x1.03 Attack x1.03 Blue Bee Attack
From Ability Tokens.Effect at Max\nCap (Stack): x1.3 Attack, x1.3 Blue Bee Attack

From Ability Tokens.Ways to Obtain: Collecting Haste tokens with the Proxy upgrade purchased during a Robo Bear Challenge Round.

From Passives.Ways to Obtain: Triggers every 10th Gummy Bee ability token or 30th gumdrops with the Gummy Mask equipped.
From Passives.Individual\nEffect: +24 Movespeed, +60 Jump Power, +75% Goo, +200% Instant Goo Conversion, +200% Gummy Bee speed, +1000% Gummy Bee gather amount, and +300 Gummy Bee attack.

From Passives.Ways to Obtain: Catching a falling coconut with the Coconut Clogs or Gummy Boots (requires Coconut Clogs) equipped.
Catching a falling coconut with the Coconut Clogs or Gummy Boots equipped.
Taking damage with the Coconut Canister equipped.
Standing next to a flame emanated from either a bee passive or from X-Flame/Ignite.
Having the Unlimited Gumdrops buff, which can be obtained by using the Glue Dispenser in Gummy Bear's Lair.
From Passives.Individual\nEffect: Using gumdrops won't take away the player's gumdrops.
From Passives.Duration\nof Effect: 3 minutes from Glue Dispenser, varies from codes

From Passives.Ways to Obtain: Being in a field where Guiding Star occurred.
From Passives.Individual\nEffect:
x2.5 Pollen, x2.5 Capacity, and x2.5 Convert Rate (to the player who summoned the star),
x1.25 Pollen, x1.25 Capacity, and x1.25 Convert Rate (to other players)
From Passives.Duration\nof Effect: When the player stays away from the field or when it fades away (10 minutes)

From Passives.Ways to Obtain: 2% chance when using gumdrops (or on the 75th gumdrop if not triggered yet) with the Gummy Star passive applied. Stack increased by the amount of goo collected.
From Passives.Effect at Max\nCap (Stack): x2 Goo, x2 White Pollen, +10% Goo Conversion, +10% Instant White Conversion.

From Passives.Ways to Obtain: Triggers every 30th boost token with the Pop Star passive applied. Stack increased by the amount of bubbles popped.
From Passives.Individual\nEffect: 10% Instant Blue Conversion, x2 Blue Pollen.
From Passives.Effect at Max\nCap (Stack): 10% Instant Blue Conversion, x4.5 Blue Pollen.

From Passives.Ways to Obtain: Popping bubbles while Pop Star Aura is active.
From Passives.Individual\nEffect: x1 Blue Field Capacity, x1 Convert Rate at Hive
From Passives.Effect at Max\nCap (Stack): x6 Blue Field Capacity, x6 Hive Convert Rate
From Passives.Duration\nof Effect:
+4 seconds (from own bubble)
+1 second (from other's bubble)
+6 seconds (from golden bubble)
Up to 2 1/2 hours

From Passives.Ways to Obtain: Triggers every 30th red boost token with the Scorching Star passive applied. Stack increased the longer the player stands near flames.
From Passives.Individual\nEffect: +50% Instant Flame Conversion, x2 Red Pollen, x2 Convert Rate, +5 Conversion Links
From Passives.Effect at Max\nCap (Stack):
50% Instant Flame Conversion, x5 Red Pollen,
x5 Convert Rate, +30 Conversion Links

From Passives.Ways to Obtain: Catching a shooting star from the Star Shower passive.

From NPCs.Ways to Obtain: Obtained from completing Science Bear's quests.
From NPCs.Effect at Max\nCap (Stack): 775% Convert Rate or 800% Convert Rate, if player has completed the last quest before the nerf

From NPCs.Ways to Obtain: Obtained from completing Polar Bear's quests and giving a present to Polar Bear (Unavailable).
Obtained from completing the Honey Bee NPC's quests and through certain codes.
Standing in a field Science Bear corrupts while on the Corrupting The Glitched Drive quest.
From NPCs.Individual\nEffect: +1% Ability Duplication Chance, x1.01 Duped Ability Pollen, +1% Instant Duped Ability Conversion
From NPCs.Effect at Max\nCap (Stack): +20% Ability Duplication Chance, x3 Duped Ability Pollen, +90% Instant Duped Ability Conversion
From NPCs.Duration\nof Effect: When the player steps away from the field, or when the corruption ends

From Items.Individual\nEffect: x1.25 Convert Rate and 10% Instant Conversion

From Items.Ways to Obtain: Using the blue extract or red extract item.
From Items.Individual\nEffect: x1.25 Red or Blue Pollen (depends on extract color)
x1.25 Bee Gather Pollen and Tools
x1.25 White Pollen, +10% Instant Conversion, and +5% Critical Chance
x1.25 Capacity, x1.5 Red Pollen, x1.5 Blue Pollen, x1.3 Bee Gather Pollen, and x1.3 Pollen From Tools

x1.5 Capacity, x1.6 Red Pollen, x1.6 Blue Pollen, x1.6 White Pollen, x1.4 Bee Gather Pollen, x1.4 Pollen From Tools, x2 Convert Rate, x1.5 Convert Rate At Hive, +12% Instant Conversion, +7% Critical Chance, x1.25 Bee Movespeed, x1.25 Player Movespeed, +1% Super-Crit Chance
+50% White Pollen, +50% Capacity, and +250% Convert Rate

From Items.Ways to Obtain: Using glitter on a field; using field dice, smooth dice, loaded dice, giving a present, or through codes.
By the Snowglobe Beequip's Snowglobe Shake, or by using the Snowflake item (Beesmas only).
From Items.Individual\nEffect: +10% Convert Rate At Hive, +5% Pollen From Tools, +5% Bee Gather Pollen, +1% Honey Per Pollen, +1% Loot Luck, x1.25 Capacity (fixed to x1.25)
From Items.Effect at Max\nCap (Stack): +25% Convert Rate At Hive, +25% Pollen From Tools, +25% Bee Gather Pollen, +5% Honey Per Pollen, +10% Loot Luck, x1.25 Capacity

From Jelly Beans.Ways to Obtain: Collect a red jelly bean token.
Collect a maroon jelly bean token.
Collect a blue jelly bean token.
Collect a navy jelly bean token.
Collect a white jelly bean token.
Collect a slate jelly bean token.
Collect a brown jelly bean token.
Collect a periwinkle jelly bean token.
Collect a teal jelly bean token.
Collect a pink jelly bean token.
Collect a black jelly bean token.
Collect a green jelly bean token.
Collect a yellow jelly bean token.
Collect a merigold jelly bean token.
Using jelly beans on a field with another player collecting the player's jelly bean tokens.
From Jelly Beans.Individual\nEffect: +100% Convert Rate, +10% White Pollen, +10% Red Pollen, +10% Blue Pollen

From Nectars.Ways to Obtain: Through bees sipping nectars of planters deployed at Blue Flower Field, Strawberry Field, or Coconut Field, using a Refreshing Vial, by claiming planters, claiming Nectar from the Nectar Pot or using the Samovar during Beesmas.
From Nectars.Individual Effect: x1.2 Blue Convert Rate, x1.1 Red Pollen, +5% Unique Instant Conversion, x1.01 Honey Per Pollen
From Nectars.Effect at Max: x2 Blue Bee Convert Rate, x1.5 Red Pollen, +25% Unique Instant Conversion, x1.05 Honey Per Pollen

From Nectars.Ways to Obtain: Through bees sipping nectars of planters deployed at Dandelion Field, Bamboo Field, or Pine Tree Forest, using a Comforting Vial, by claiming planters, claiming Nectar from the Nectar Pot or using the Samovar during Beesmas.
From Nectars.Individual Effect: x1.1 Blue Pollen, x1.2 Convert Rate at Hive, x1.2 Colorless Convert Rate, x1.01 Honey Per Pollen
From Nectars.Effect at Max: x1.5 Blue Pollen, x2 Convert Rate at Hive, x2 Colorless Bee Convert Rate, x1.05 Honey Per Pollen

From Nectars.Ways to Obtain: Through bees sipping nectars of planters deployed at Sunflower Field, Pineapple Patch, or Pumpkin Patch, using a Satisfying Vial, by claiming planters, claiming Nectar from the Nectar Pot or using the Samovar during Beesmas.
From Nectars.Individual Effect: x1.1 Honey at Hive, x1.2 Red Convert Rate, x1.2 White Pollen, x1.01 Honey Per Pollen
From Nectars.Effect at Max: x1.5 Honey at Hive, x2 Red Bee Convert Rate, x2 White Pollen, x1.05 Honey Per Pollen

From Nectars.Ways to Obtain: Through bees sipping nectars of planters deployed at Mushroom Field, Spider Field, Stump Field, or Rose Field, using a Motivating Vial, by claiming planters, claiming Nectar from the Nectar Pot or using the Samovar during Beesmas.
From Nectars.Individual Effect: x1.1 Blue Pollen, x1.1 Convert Rate, +1% Bee Ability Rate, x1.01 Honey Per Pollen
From Nectars.Effect at Max: x1.5 Blue Pollen, x1.5 Convert Rate, +5% Bee Ability Rate, x1.05 Honey Per Pollen

From Nectars.Ways to Obtain: Through bees sipping nectars of planters deployed at Clover Field, Ant Field, Cactus Field, Mountain Top Field, or Pepper Patch, using an Invigorating Vial, by claiming planters, claiming Nectar from the Nectar Pot or using the Samovar during Beesmas.
From Nectars.Individual Effect: x1.1 Red Pollen, 1.1x Convert Rate, +2% Bee Attack, x1.01 Honey Per Pollen
From Nectars.Effect at Max: x1.5 Red Pollen, 1.5x Convert Rate, +10% Bee Attack, x1.05 Honey Per Pollen

From Codes.Individual\nEffect: x2 Capacity, x2 Hive Convert Rate
x1.25 Pollen From Tools, x1.25 Bee Gather Pollen, x1.25 Event Bee Ability Pollen, +100 Convert Amount, +50% Capacity, +10% Nectar, +1% Critical Chance, +1% Super-crit Chance

From Areas.Ways to Obtain: Using the Honey Dispenser, Treat Dispenser, Strawberry Dispenser, Blueberry Dispenser, and the Royal Jelly Dispenser.
Using the Royal Jelly Dispenser in the Star Hall and through codes.
Using the Strawberry Dispenser or the Blueberry Dispenser.
From Areas.Individual\nEffect: x1.2 Red/Blue Pollen (depends on boost color)
From Areas.Effect at Max\nCap (Stack): x3 Red/Blue Pollen (depends on boost color)

From Areas.Ways to Obtain: Using the Glue Dispenser in Gummy Bear's Lair and through codes.
From Areas.Individual\nEffect: Using gumdrops won't take away gumdrops from the player's inventory
From Areas.Duration\nof Effect: Up to 3 minutes from Glue Dispenser, varies from codes

From Areas.Ways to Obtain: Using the Wealth Clock or through codes.
From Areas.Duration\nof Effect: Until the player leaves the game for more than 15 minutes

From Areas.Ways to Obtain: Using the Field Booster, Red Field Booster, Blue Field Booster, Coconut Dispenser, or through certain codes.
Possible reward from the Wind Shrine and through codes. The more early the field, the more pollen the Winds give.
From Areas.Individual\nEffect: +25% Instant Field Conversion, +28-32% Field Pollen, +1% White Pollen
From Areas.Effect at Max\nCap (Stack):
+67% Instant Field Conversion, +98-102% Field Pollen, +15% White Pollen
(In the case of the Hub Field, it gives 175% Field Pollen. Not obtainable from the Wind Shrine.)

From Areas.Duration\nof Effect: 5 minutes, or until the player dies or leaves the game

From Areas.Individual\nEffect: x1.5 Field Capacity, x1.25 Field Pollen, varying other buffs.

From Areas.Ways to Obtain: Possible reward from the Galentine Shrine.
From Areas.Individual\nEffect: +50% Capacity, +15% Instant Bee Ability Conversion, +50% Rose Field Pollen, +50% Blue Flower Field Pollen, +50% Sunflower Field Pollen, +5% Ticket Chance, +5% Loot Luck, +1% Super-Crit Chance.

From Areas.Ways to Obtain: Defeating a Rare or better Puffshroom
From Areas.Individual\nEffect: +1.4% Unique Instant Conversion, +1.4% Pollen, +1.4% Capacity, +1.4% Honey from Tokens
From Areas.Effect at Max\nCap (Stack): +10% Unique Instant Conversion, +10% Pollen, +10% Capacity, +10% Honey from Tokens
From Areas.Duration\nof Effect: 3 hours maximum, can stack up by defeating Rare and better Puffshrooms to get Puffshroom Blessing.

From Tools.Ways to Obtain: Granted when Dark Scythe's collection area hits a normal flame.
From Tools.Individual\nEffect: x1.05 Super-Crit Power, +10% Instant Red Ability Conversion
From Tools.Effect at Max\nCap (Stack): x6 Super-Crit Power, +109% Instant Red Ability Conversion
From Tools.Duration\nof Effect: Until all active dark flames despawn

From Tools.Ways to Obtain: Granted by collecting goo covered flowers with the Gummyballer.
Given when a gummyball hits any of these listed items: 2 stacks for hitting a field wall, 1 per ability token, 3 per honey token, 8 per mark, and 30 per precise mark.
Granted whenever one of the player's bubbles is popped in any way with Tide Popper equipped.
From Tools.Duration\nof Effect: Until this buff reaches x500, until the player leaves the game or until the player switches tools

From Tools.Ways to Obtain: Granted when a tidal wave hits a balloon during 'Tidal Surge'. Hitting a balloon will add 3 seconds to this buff. (6 seconds if the balloon is gold.)
From Tools.Individual\nEffect: x1.01 Blue Pollen, x1.01 Honey From Tokens, x1.01 Convert Rate At Hive, x1.01 Bee Gather Pollen, x1.01 Pollen From Tools
From Tools.Effect at Max\nCap (Stack): x1.2 Blue Pollen, x1.2 Honey From Tokens, x1.2 Convert Rate At Hive, x1.2 Bee Gather Pollen, x1.2 Pollen From Tools
From Tools.Duration\nof Effect: Up to 4 hours or until the player switches tools

From Tools.Ways to Obtain: Granted when 'Tide Power' reaches x500. Popping bubbles while this buff is active increases its length.
From Tools.Effect at Max\nCap (Stack):
x2.50 Collector Tool Speed
(Starts at x2.50, gradually goes down over time)

From Other.Ways to Obtain: Claiming a hive during Beesmas, opening the Mondo Present (Beesmas 2019), opening the Mondo Gift Box (Beesmas 2020, Beesmas 2021 and Beesmas 2022) and through certain codes.
Standing under a cloud while having Gifted Windy Bee.

From Other.Individual\nEffect: x1.02 Capacity, x1.02 Convert Rate At Hive, +10% Pollen
From Other.Effect at Max\nCap (Stack): x1.2 Capacity, x1.2 Convert Rate At Hive, +10% Pollen

From Other.Ways to Obtain: Catching a falling Beesmas Light when gathering on a field, after completing Science Bear's Beesmas Quest. Or possibly generated ability token by a Gifted bee.
Guaranteed Token when a Festive Nymph is defeated.
From Other.Individual\nEffect: +1,000 Capacity, 1% Instant Bee Gather Conversion, +1% Honey Per Pollen, +1% Bee Attack
From Other.Effect at Max\nCap (Stack): +250,000 Capacity, 5% Instant Bee Gather Conversion, 5% Honey Per Pollen, 5% Bee Attack

From Other.Ways to Obtain: Granted after completing a Robo Party, and can be granted from tokens dropped by Party Mobs. Can also be activated through certain code(s)
From Other.Individual\nEffect: +1,000 Capacity, +1% Critical Power, +1% White Pollen, +1% Red Pollen, +1% Blue Pollen
From Other.Effect at Max\nCap (Stack): +100,000 Capacity, +50% Critical Power, +50% White Pollen, +50% Red Pollen, +50% Blue Pollen

Debuffs.Ways to Obtain: When Stick Bug traps the player with twigs.
Debuffs.Individual\nEffect: x0.75 Player Movespeed and Jump Power, 3 damage over time, until the affected player is dead
Debuffs.Ways to Remove: Collect pollen or wait until the player dies.

Debuffs.Ways to Obtain: Collect a spoiled jelly bean token.
Debuffs.Ways to Remove: Wait until the timer runs out.

Debuffs.Individual\nEffect: x0 Movespeed, x0 Jump Power, x0.2 Bee Movespeed
Debuffs.Ways to Remove: Wait until the timer runs out.

Debuffs.Ways to Obtain: When a Mechsquito laser touches the player during the Robo Bear Challenge or Robo Party.
Debuffs.Ways to Remove: Wait until the timer runs out.

Debuffs.Ways to Obtain: During a Robo Bear Challenge Round
Debuffs.Individual\nEffect: x0.1 Capacity, x0.1 Pollen from Tools, x0.1 Movement Collection Pollen, x0.2 Pollen from Coconuts.
Debuffs.Effect at Max\nCap (Stack): x0.5 Capacity, x0.5 Pollen from Tools, x0.5 Movement Collection Pollen, x1 Pollen from Coconuts.
Debuffs.Ways to Remove: Wait until the round ends, quit the Robo Bear Challenge, or complete the quest.
